channel.title: TsunamiUDP - 标签 - cloudSky's 小站
channel.description: TsunamiUDP - 标签 - cloudSky's 小站

item.title: 利用TsunamiUDP加速跨机房迁移
item.description: 部署 yum -y install automake autoconf git clone git://github.com/rriley/tsunami-udp.git cd tsunami-udp ./recompile.sh cp server/tsunamid client/tsunami /usr/bin #或者从sf.net下载 wget http://iweb.dl.sourceforge.net/project/tsunami-udp/tsunami-udp/tsunami-v1.1-cvsbuild42/tsunami-v1.1-cvsbuild42.tar.gz tar zxf tsunami-v1.1-cvsbuild42.tar.gz cd tsunami-udp-v11-b42 ./recompile.sh cp server/tsunamid client/tsunami /usr/bin 使用 #1、防火墙调整 #服务端：开启TCP 46224(默认端
